      • saveLastSync

        boolean saveLastSync(java.lang.String storedVariableName,
                   long currentSyncTime)
        Parameters:
        storedVariableName - variable name in the shared preference
        currentSyncTime - updates the last sync time with current sync time
        Returns:
        true if the last sync time is stored in shared preferences

      • getLastSync

        Parameters:
        storedVariableName - variable name in the shared preference
        Returns:
        last sync time stored in the shared preference

      • applyChanges

        boolean applyChanges(java.lang.String data)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if data inserted successfully else false

      • sendDataChanges

        java.lang.String sendDataChanges(java.util.List<? extends Entity> input,
                               long modifiedSince,
                               java.lang.String url)
        Parameters:
        input - the json data to be send,
        modifiedSince - items that have been updated in server since this time has passed,
        url - url of the webservices
        Returns:
        the response of the webservices

      • getData

        java.util.List<? extends Entity> getData(long lastSyncTime,
                                       long currentSyncTime)
        Parameters:
        lastSyncTime - the last sync time that is stored in shared preference,
        currentSyncTime - current sync time
        Returns:
        the list of entries from the tables which is greater than or equal to lastsyncTime and less than or equal to currentSyncTime
